title: Our Team
subtitle: Meet the people behind Horsebean Private Server — they make it all possible.

asuna.name: Asuna
asuna.description: Responsible for all Web development and maintenance — our Web services are all thanks to her.

horsebean.name: Horsebean
horsebean.description: The current server update developer, inherited the Boom-Beach-Server from Ultrapowa on GitHub in 2022.

shei-bi.name: Shei_Bi
shei-bi.description: The leading reverse engineer behind the largest Brawl Stars private server project, providing technical guidance for our team.

sunflower.name: Sunflower
sunflower.description: Patiently dedicated to server debugging, testing, and optimization, striving to deliver the best gaming experience.

panda.name: Little Panda
panda.description: Driven by both interest and passion, continuously learning and optimizing the server under Horsebean's guidance.

goose.name: Goose
goose.description: Handles video promotion, operations, community management, modding, full-stack maintenance, and feature development — loves creating with passion.
